page.title: 03Rangemore Primary School
page.content: The school I go to was built in 1873 and extended in 1966. It is called{All {Saints C.E.(C) Primary School}and children from Rangemore, Tatenhill and Needwood come to it. Those who live nearby can walk or come by car, but 28 children come on the school bus. There are 3 classes in the school, which has{29 Infants}(5-7 years),{22 {Lower Juniors}(7-9 years), and{24 {Upper Juniors}(9-11 years). There are 3 full-time teachers and a part-time teacher. An ancillary helps and is school secretary also. We can stay for school dinners prepared in the kitchen by cook and 3 lady helpers. A cleaner-in-charge keeps our school clean. Our headteacher lives in the{School {House}next to the school.
